title.narrative: 1.2 S & D:IMP QUALITY HEALTH CARE SERVIC

description.narrative: 1.2 S & D-By 2017 improved quality health care & HIV/AIDS services have improved early childhood care and development and reduced infant mortality in at least 80% of underserved areas, which contributes to Adolescent Health And Nutrition, Adolescents And Hiv/Aids, Care And Treatment Of Children Affected By Hiv And Aids, Child Health, Early Childhood Development, Health And Emergencies, Health Systems Strengthening, Health â€“ General, Hiv Prevention, Hiv â€“ General, Immunization, Maternal And Newborn Health, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Pmtct And Infant Male Circumcision, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition, Protect, Care And Support Children And Families Affected By Hiv. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2017 improved quality social services are available and utilized, so disparities and inequalities are reduced in Health, HIV AIDS, Nutrition, Water Sanitation, Education & Child protection
